name: Global Business Scholarship
description: A scholarship aimed at supporting students pursuing a degree in business with a focus on global markets.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to students enrolled in a business program with a focus on international business. Must have a minimum GPA of 3.5.

name: Tech Innovators Scholarship
description: A scholarship for students who demonstrate exceptional innovation in the field of technology.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to undergraduate and graduate students in computer science or related fields. Must submit a project demonstrating innovation.

name: Women in STEM Scholarship
description: A scholarship designed to support women pursuing degrees in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to female students enrolled in a STEM program. Must have a minimum GPA of 3.0.

name: Leadership Excellence Scholarship
description: A scholarship for students who have demonstrated exceptional leadership skills in their academic and extracurricular activities.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to students in any field of study. Must provide evidence of leadership roles and achievements.

name: Data Science Excellence Scholarship
description: A scholarship for students who have shown outstanding performance in the field of data science.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to students enrolled in a data science program. Must have a minimum GPA of 3.7.

name: Diversity in Data Science Scholarship
description: A scholarship aimed at promoting diversity in the field of data science.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to students from underrepresented groups in data science. Must be enrolled in a data science program.

name: Psychology Merit Scholarship
description: A scholarship for students who have demonstrated academic excellence in the field of psychology.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to students enrolled in a psychology program. Must have a minimum GPA of 3.5.

name: Mental Health Awareness Scholarship
description: A scholarship for students who are actively involved in promoting mental health awareness.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to students in any field of study. Must provide evidence of involvement in mental health awareness activities.

name: Global Health Scholarship
description: A scholarship for students pursuing a degree in public health with a focus on global health issues.

content.title: Eligibility
content.description: Open to students enrolled in a public health program. Must have a minimum GPA of 3.4.
